name: Pelagic Freezer-trawler Association
goal:
uitoefening van duurzame pelagische visserij door vriestrawlers

sustainable pelagic fisheries by freezer-trawlers
interests: Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
implementation landing obligation / discards plans
Technical Measures regulation
Fisheries Control regulation
Long term management Strategy N E Atlantic pelagic stocks
regionalisation of fisheries management
fisheries negotiations between EU and coastal states
Fisheries Partnership Agreements with 3rd countries
RFMO's relevant for our fisheries
scientific work in collaboration with bodies such as ICES
Brexit
